fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per day, Guess a player as the role you know.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, once everyone has confirmed their roles, you will learn a random role that exists within the game, which cannot win with the Town.
- When you Guess a player, the host will privately ask that player if they are the role that you learned.
- Whenever your target directly responds to the host's question, their exact response will be relayed to you.
